EmailTemplate.description: Flow: Template used in Registration Flow
EmailTemplate.name: SR Registration Email Verification
EmailTemplate.subject: Students Rebuild Verify Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Team Name: {!Contact.Students_Rebuild_Team_Name__c}
Click to Complete Registration https://bspwebsync-bff-sandboxbspwebsync.cs14.force.com/registration?varInputContactId={!Contact.Id}&varInputConfirm=True
Need help? contact us
